June 21, 1986 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a
None
The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('Huldigungs March' (Homage) - Grieg arr. Reynolds): 1 St Austell, 95 2 Camborne, 94 3 Flowers, 92 4 St Keverne, 88 5 Redruth, 85 6 Bugle, 84 7 Kernow, 83
Best player: Paul Richards, cornet, St Austell
Best Soprano: Mark Medlyn, Camborne Best Solo Cornet: Paul Richards, St. Austell Best Euphonium: David Pope, Mount Charles Best Solo Horn: Gary Lannie, St. Austell Best Set of Basses: Flowers (Gloucester)
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Andrea Ambrose, Ian Hooper
Deportment (judge WO Roberts): 1 Torrington (Class C) 2 Hatherleigh (Class C)
July 17, 2010, 11:28 a.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 1:03 p.m.
